name: The Deepest Point in the World
name_original: The Deepest Point in the World
description:
I made a game in 72 hours inspired by the Barış Özcan’s video “What is in the deepest point in the world?”

You can control the character with the W,A,S,D keys and Spacebar for jump.

Our goal is going to the deepest in the ocean and collect things what should not be here.

Have fun!
